text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A few days after the group starts<n>practicing...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: H-h-h-here I go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ahh! D-Doto! Run off in a hurry like<n>that and you'll—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Crash!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ohh... Sniffle.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I'm so sorry, I can't believe Itripped again... This practice isn'thelping anyone, is it? I'm really sorry!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
D-don't sweat it! I'm sure you'll get<n>the hang of it
tomorrow, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But... I haven't gotten a single card<n>since we started
practicing...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
All I've managed to do is bring you<n>tumbling down with me,
and send a<n>random card flying at the other two...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That was quite the thrilling<n>experience! This overlord almost
got a<n>card to her beautiful face!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: We had to stop, drop, and roll—it was<n>so fun!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ohh... I always have to screw thingsup for everyone... I really am justa nuisance...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, the tournament's not<n>looking so good... I'll
screw something<n>up and we'll go home without a<n>single
win...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(My resolution is supposed to be<n>making others happy, but
it might just<n>be another year of making them<n>annoyed...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, I can't let that happen... Um,<n>I-I'm going to go practice a
little more!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Wha? Where are you—Doto?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well, well. Fickle as a feather in the<n>wind... It seems my
partner has left<n>me.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hm... In that case, I think I shall take<n>my leave. The new
year must begin<n>with a grand show, and there is much<n>to
prepare!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Opera O too? Aw, c'mon, I<n>thought we could all head
back<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well, they're both gone now.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I wonder if Doto's all right. It's<n>not like we need to
win, so I hope<n>she's not being too hard on herself...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wait, we don't need to win? Why<n>not?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Because Shiraoki didn't tell us "You<n>better win!" or anything.
In this kind of<n>event, it's having fun that matters<n>most.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, playing karuta with friends is<n>fun! Which is why I think
winning<n>would be even more fun!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Wouldn't you be happy if we won<n>together? I would, and
that's why I<n>want to win!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
AAAAGHH! Your motivations are too<n>pure! It's blinding!
Blinding, I say!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Blinding? Oh, there's some shade<n>over there! Wanna
move?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No, don't mind me! ...Anyways, let's<n>call it a day. More
practice awaits<n>tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah, let's keep it up!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
(If we win, it'll be more fun... So<n>simple, and yet... Urara
never fails to<n>amaze.)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: (Wonder if Doto and her team are still<n>practicing...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
This past year, me being such a<n>screwup has caused you a
bunch of<n>trouble, so...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I want to bring happiness to you too!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Sorry, but I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I could use a breather...
Sob... Listen for the poem, thenrun!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
No running into people. Listen to Opera<n>O's orders, and... and
what else?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: What kind of practice could makeme any better? Ohh, why am Ialways so useless and clumsy...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: B-but, I have to do this! O-onemore try!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Whoooa!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto... What are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Ayabe... Well, you see, I... I'm<n>practicing on my own, like
a solo boot<n>camp kinda...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I... I'm dragging everyone down<n>again, and... Ooohhh, I'm
never going<n>to change, am I...
